mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECALL_BOARD ( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT ) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardName}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT FROM RECALL_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT FROM RECALL_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET ${(pageNum - 1) * amount}
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT FROM RECALL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE RECALL_BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DATE, HIT FROM RECALL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
